title: The Dragon's Torment: Book 1.5 | The Dragon's Song
description: Set in the five hundred years between The Dragon’s Throne (book 1) and The Dragon’s Downfall (book 2), The Dragon’s Torment follows Cori through the harrowing and heartbreaking years of immortality as seen through the eyes of those who cross her path. The Dragon’s Torment is a must read novella for lovers of The Dragon’s Song Series
author: Emily L.K.
